3 of 194 letters are incomplete, 7 telegrams, 8 envelopes, 1 typescript essay "Die Büste des Kaisers", 1 photograph (handwriting on back posits may be ancestor of Roth’s). Folder 12.4 includes typescripts of sections of letters held at Zweig Archive in London and elsewhere. 1 of the letters and 1 telegram are addressed to Friderike Zweig
